Class CameraActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.canonfer.ecatalog.activities.CameraActivity

public class CameraActivity
extends Activity

This activity manages the camera , the preview of the picture and the required images processing

productImageOriginCorner

public Point productImageOriginCorner(float canvasW,
                                      float canvasH,
                                      float productW,
                                      float productH)
This method computes the distance in X,Y between the top-left corner of a rectangle inside a container. For the container also the top-left corner is used. both with the same center

Parameters:
canvasW - width container rect
canvasH - height container rect
productW - width of the inner rect
productH - Height of the inner rect
